title: The Peace and Hope of Easter | President Russell M. Nelson Palm Sunday Invitation
author: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
description:
President Russell M. Nelson of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints shares a story illustrating how to find peace in troubling times and circumstances. As the world seeks relief from the stains of a disrupted year, President Nelson reminds us there is only one way to find the solemnity and tranquility of lasting peace—the enduring peace that passes all understanding. That surpassing peace is found in Jesus Christ, the Prince of Peace.

As Christians around the world join to celebrate Palm Sunday, President Nelson invites all to make the coming week a time of holiness by remembering not just the palms that were waved to herald Jesus Christ’s entrance into Jerusalem but the palms of His hands that are a mark of His selfless sacrifice.

Worship with us this Easter at churchofjesuschrist.org

SUBSCRIBE to The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints for the latest videos: http://bit.ly/1M0iPwY 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/churchofjesuschrist
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ch_jesuschrist?lang=en
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ChurchOfJesusChrist/
Website: https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/inspiration/latter-day-saints-channel/?lang=eng

localize.description:
耶稣基督后期圣徒教会的罗素-纳尔逊主席分享了一个故事，说明如何在动荡的时代和环境中找到平安。当全世界都在寻求从这混乱的一年的污点中解脱出来的时候，纳尔逊总统提醒我们，只有一种方法可以找到持久和平的庄严和安宁--超越一切理解的持久和平。这超越一切的平安在和平的王子耶稣基督身上找到。

当世界各地的基督徒共同庆祝棕枝主日时，纳尔逊总统邀请大家在接下来的一周里，不仅要记住为预示耶稣基督进入耶路撒冷而挥动的手掌，还要记住他的手掌，那是他无私牺牲的标志。

复活节与我们一起敬拜，请登录churchofjesuschrist.org。

订阅耶稣基督后期圣徒教会的最新视频：http://bit.ly/1M0iPwY。

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/churchofjesuschrist
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ch_jesuschrist?lang=en
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ChurchOfJesusChrist/
网站：https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/inspiration/latter-day-saints-channel/?lang=eng
localize.title: 复活节的平安与希望｜罗素-纳尔逊总统棕枝主日邀请函

localize.description:
耶穌基督後期聖徒教會的羅素-納爾遜主席分享了一個故事，說明如何在動盪的時代和環境中找到平安。當全世界都在尋求從這混亂的一年的污點中解脫出來的時候，納爾遜總統提醒我們，只有一種方法可以找到持久和平的莊嚴和安寧--超越一切理解的持久和平。這超越一切的平安在和平的王子耶穌基督身上找到。

當世界各地的基督徒共同慶祝棕枝主日時，納爾遜總統邀請大家在接下來的一週裏，不僅要記住爲預示耶穌基督進入耶路撒冷而揮動的手掌，還要記住他的手掌，那是他無私犧牲的標誌。

復活節與我們一起敬拜，請登錄churchofjesuschrist.org。

訂閱耶穌基督後期聖徒教會的最新視頻：http://bit.ly/1M0iPwY。

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/churchofjesuschrist
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ch_jesuschrist?lang=en
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ChurchOfJesusChrist/
網站：https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/inspiration/latter-day-saints-channel/?lang=eng
localize.title: 復活節的平安與希望｜羅素-納爾遜總統棕枝主日邀請函
